caption.title: Estimated incursions per region through time.
caption.p: The map and incursions are colour-coded by region (BB = Brandenburg, MV = Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, SN = Sachsen, ST = Sachsen-Anhalt, and TH = Th√ºringen). Light grey regions represented neighbouring regions included in the model from Germany, Czech Republic, and Poland. The darker lines represent the mean number of incursions estimated per region. The lighter envelopes indicate the credible intervals.
